channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: BMW expects to take €1 billion hit from growing tariff war
item.description: BMW and other European carmakers are bracing to see the full extent of Donald Trump’s planned tariffs on vehicles imported to the U.S.

item.title: DOGE’s frenetic rush to cancel government leases will hit dozens of federal offices by June and hundreds more over coming months: ‘It’s like a blitzkrieg’
item.description: Several agencies are facing 20 or more lease cancellations in all, including the IRS, the Social Security Administration, the U.S. Department of Agric...

item.title: Gold tops $3,000. Here’s what investors joining the gold rush need to know.
S&P 500 flirts with correction as Trump’s trade war escalates. What comes next?
Beijing criticizes CK Hutchison’s $23 billion Panama Canal deal by reposting commentary that slams it as ‘an act of submission’
item.description: CK Hutchison dropped by over 6% in Hong Kong trading on Friday, even as the city's benchmark Hang Seng Index rose by over 2%.

item.title: Government shutdown odds rise. Here’s what it means for markets and your wallet.
S&P 500 closes in a correction as U.S. stocks slide on more Trump tariff threats
Publicis New York CEO Carla Serrano and the downside of Trump’s war against all
item.description: Also: Stocks enter a correction, Tesla complained about tariffs.

item.title: The drugstore industry is struggling. Here’s what could be in its future.
Trump says a 200% tariff on European alcohol would be ‘great’ for American businesses but wine sellers say it will slam the whole industry—’including U.S. wineries’
item.description: Wine and spirits from the 27-nation European Union made up 17% of the total consumed in the U.S. in 2023.
